screen.captcha.generic.instruction: Please complete this Test to proceed
screen.captcha.boxes.single.title: Single Image Boxes
screen.captcha.boxes.single.instruction1: You need to be at least %s Percent correct.
screen.captcha.boxes.multi.title: Multi Image Boxes
screen.captcha.boxes.multi.instruction1: Click on §6proceed§r once none are left.
screen.captcha.puzzle.title: Puzzle Piece
screen.captcha.puzzle.instruction0: Slide the puzzle piece into the right spot.
screen.captcha.wonky-text.title: Wonky Text
screen.captcha.wonky-text.instruction0: Type the Characters you see in the Image.
screen.captcha.comprehension.title: Comprehension Test
screen.captcha.comprehension.instruction: Click on the %1$s in the color of the %2$s.
screen.captcha.math.title: Math
screen.captcha.math.instruction1: The Result is always a truncated Integral Number.
screen.captcha.image-search.title: Image Search
screen.captcha.wimmelbild.title: Wimmelbild
screen.captcha.rorschach.title: Rorschach
screen.captcha.rorschach.instruction0: What do you see in this image ?
screen.captcha.rorschach.instruction1: How does this Image make you feel ?
screen.captcha.rorschach.instruction2: Summarize your thoughts on this image in 4 words or less.
screen.captcha.rorschach.instruction3: Do you find comfort in entropy ?
screen.captcha.gambling.title: Gambling Addiction
screen.captcha.gambling.instruction1: The higher your bet, the more you (can) win.
screen.captcha.gambling.instruction2: 90% of gambling addicts quit right before they hit it big.
screen.captcha.sponsor.title: Sponsorship
screen.captcha.sponsor.instruction0: Now for a message from our Sponsor
screen.captcha.wires.title: Cut the Wire
screen.captcha.wires.instruction0: Cut the correct wire before the time runs out.
screen.captcha.wires.instruction1: You are supplied with a bomb defusal manual.
screen.captcha.amongus.title: There is an Impostor among us
screen.captcha.wizard.title: THE WIZARD ESCAPED
screen.captcha.wizard.instruction0: QUICK,, CAPTURE THE MALIGNANT LITTLE CRITTER!!
